title: Kate Middleton's summer shorts are having a major style moment
description: On her 2022 tour of The Bahamas with Prince William, Kate wore a pair of sage green chino shorts that made a lasting impression.
content:
Daily Mail journalists select and curate the products that feature on our site. If you make a purchase via links on this page we will earn commission - learn more

With summer in full swing, a versatile pair of shorts is the ultimate wardrobe essential - polished enough for city wear, yet effortless for weekends away.

And when it comes to timeless style, who better to take cues from than the Princess of Wales? On her 2022 tour of The Bahamas with Prince William, Kate wore a pair of sage green chino shorts that made a lasting impression.

Perfectly tailored with a mid-rise waist and clean lines, they struck the ideal balance between polished and effortless.

The best thing about this look is its staying power. It's the kind of piece you can wear year after year, and I wouldn't be surprised if Kate still packs them for her summer holidays.

It's no wonder smart shorts are having a moment on the high street.

Boden's Dulwich Linen Shorts are a standout. Available in seven colourways, the black pair is especially versatile, with a flattering high waist and pleat detailing. They transition easily from office wear to off-duty exploring, and they're currently reduced from £79 to £55.30.

For a softer pop of colour, Karen Millen's City Shorts in cornflower blue offer a seamless blend of structure and comfort. Crafted from a lightweight woven fabric, they look smart while staying breathable, and they're now just £35 (down from £69). A khaki version is also available.

Phase Eight's Lottie Linen-blend Shorts are designed to resist creasing, making them an instant winner. The vibrant papaya orange hue is right on, while the longer length provides a little extra coverage for those who prefer it.

Of course, there are plenty more chic options from the likes of Mango, Reiss and Mint Velvet, catering to all tastes. Scroll on to see the best of the rest...
summary: The versatile and stylish summer shorts are becoming a fashion trend, with Kate Middleton's sage green chino shorts, which she wore on her 2022 tour of The Bahamas with Prince William. The style of these shorts has been praised for their timeless appeal and staying power. Boden's Dulwich Linen Shorts, available in seven colourways, are particularly versatile and are currently being reduced from £79 to £55.30. Other notable items include Karen Millen's City Shorts in cornflower blue, which are designed to blend structure and comfort while remaining breathable.
shortSummary: Kate Middleton's versatile summer shorts are gaining popularity, offering versatile, pocket-sized options like Boden's Dulwich Linen Shorts and Karen Millen's City Shorts, offering timeless, but affordable options.

The long and short of it
Unlike many brands, at Boden we know that ‘petite’ sizing (designed for customers 5ft 3in or under) isn’t just about trimming a bit off the hem. Instead, we’ve proportionally shortened the length throughout on these garments – not just at the knee or ankle – so that they fit and flatter all over. You’ll notice the difference when you try them on.
In jumpsuits we also offer a ‘tall’ size for customers 5ft 10in or over. We’ve not just added extra fabric to the legs but increased the length proportionately throughout the style to ensure a noticeably improved, flattering fit.
For our ‘long’ styles, we’ve added extra length at the bottom, so you can choose where you’d like the hemline to fall and whether you’d like to wear the garment with flats or (hooray) heels.

Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, is the elder son of King Charles III and the late Princess Diana. Prince William is married to the Princess of Wales, Kate Middleton, and they have three children: Prince George, Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis. He has also served in the British Armed Forces.

Product Description
Our chino shorts are a style that should hold space in every spring and summer wardrobe. They've been a favourite for many seasons and for many reasons. They sit mid-thigh for a flattering fit and have a mid-rise waist with elastication. The cotton blend fabric has a brushed fabric finish with a peached handle from added modal which makes them soft to touch, the colour is perfect for the season and the hems can be rolled up or down as you fancy. They have a two-way stretch for added comfort, a full zip and fly fastening, side entry pockets, two welt pockets to the back and belt loops to help you accessorise in style. Brushed fabric finish for a soft hand-feel. Peached handle from added modal. Mid-thigh length. Two-way stretch for added comfort. Mid-rise waist with elastication. Belt loops. Zip and fly fastening. Side pockets. Rear welt pockets with button detail.

argos_summary: The article highlights the versatility and timeless style of shorts, particularly inspired by the Princess of Wales, Kate Middleton, who wore sage green chino shorts during her 2022 Bahamas tour. It showcases various chic options available on the high street, including Boden's Dulwich Linen Shorts and Karen Millen's City Shorts, emphasizing their adaptability for both city wear and casual outings. The piece encourages readers to shop these trending styles as summer continues.
